title: Home Row - Basic
description: Practice the home row keys: asdf jkl;
content: fff jjj fff jjj ddd kkk ddd kkk sss lll sss lll aaa ;;; aaa ;;; fj fj fj dk dk dk sl sl sl a; a; a;

title: Home Row - Words
description: Type simple words using home row keys
content: ask fall sad lad all fad jak als flask salad flak

title: Top Row Introduction
description: Learn the top row keys: qwert yuiop
content: qqq ppp www ooo eee iii rrr uuu ttt yyy qp qp wo wo ei ei ru ru ty ty

title: Top Row - Words
description: Practice words using top and home rows
content: write quite type pour your wire trip royal poetry quote

title: Bottom Row Introduction
description: Learn the bottom row keys: zxcv bnm,./
content: zzz /// xxx ... ccc ,,, vvv mmm bbb nnn zx zx cv cv bn bn m, m, ./ ./

title: Bottom Row - Words
content: zone become civil maximum number brave context example zoom cabin

title: Simple Sentences
description: Type complete sentences with proper spacing
content: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Practice makes perfect. Type with precision and speed. Focus on accuracy first.

title: Mixed Practice
description: Combination of letters, numbers, and punctuation
content: Today is December 7, 2025. She scored 98.5% on her test. The package costs $49.99 plus tax. Email: user@example.com

title: Advanced Typing
content: In the digital age, typing efficiently is essential for productivity. Whether you're writing emails, coding software, or creating documents, touch typing skills will serve you well. Practice daily to improve your speed and accuracy!
